description: This story humorously depicts why skeletons don't fight each other, emphasizing their lack of guts.
title: Boneless Dispute
n_1: Skelly confronts Boney in the graveyard, ready for an argument.
n_2: Skelly attempts to look threatening, but Boney remains unimpressed.
n_3: Skelly's attempts at aggression turn into comical gestures.
n_4: Realizing the humor in their situation, both skeletons laugh together.
c1_1: I'm going to give you a piece of my mind!
c2_1: Oh yeah? You and what army?
c1_2: Just look at my fierce stance!
c2_2: You mean your lack of muscles?
c1_3: Grrr, if only I had the guts!
c1_4: Guess we really can't fight, can we?
